taxon.author: O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1871
taxon.distribution: Europe, Russia (Europe to South Siberia), Azerbaijan, Iran

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1871a). Descriptions of some British spiders new to science, with a notice of others, of which some are now for the first time recorded as British species. Transactions of the Linnean Society of London 27(3): 393-464, pl. 54-57.
